doc.name: Box3D
doc.description: This actor contains the geometry and appearance specifications for a box. The output port is used to connect this actor to the Java3D scene graph. This actor will only have meaning in the GR domain. The parameters xLength, yHeight, and zWidth determine the dimensions of box. The rest of the parameters are described in the base class.
doc.author: Chamberlain Fong, Edward A. Lee
doc.property: The length of the box in the x-axis. This has type double with default 0.1.
The height of the box in the y-axis. This has type double with default 0.1.
The width of the box in the z-axis. This has type double with default 0.1.
